quantitySelector.copy:
Most drivers replace 4 tires.
If you had a flat tire, replace at least two.

technicalSpecs.title: Get technical
technicalSpecs.description: The ContiProContact is Continental's Grand Touring All-Season tire originally developed for European sport coupes and sedans sold in North America, and is now available for a wide range of imported and domestic cars.

identifyTrim.alternateSearchCopy: We can also identify the tires you need by size.  Find the number on the sidewall of your tire, owner’s manual or placard on the driver-side door.
